# Pankaj Kumawat Official

> Portfolio and technical resource hub for Pankaj Kumawat, a Python Developer specializing in Django, Web Development, and Responsive Design.

Important notes:
*   Site functions as a combined professional portfolio and technical blog.
*   Primary content types are project showcases, technical tutorials, and software engineering case studies.

## Portfolio
-   [Home](https://pankajkumawat.in/): Professional overview and core competencies in software engineering.
-   [About](https://pankajkumawat.in/about/): Background, professional philosophy, and detailed skill set.
-   Projects
    -   [Project Portfolio](https://pankajkumawat.in/projects/): Gallery of completed software engineering projects.
    -   Case Studies
        -   [Scalable Web Applications](https://pankajkumawat.in/projects/scalable-web-app/): End-to-end build of scalable applications.
        -   [System Design Projects](https://pankajkumawat.in/projects/system-design/): Architecture and design implementations.
-   [Contact](https://pankajkumawat.in/contact/): Methods for professional inquiries and collaboration.

## Technical Resources
-   Tools & Tutorials
    -   [JavaScript](https://pankajkumawat.in/tags/javascript/): Modern JavaScript and frameworks.
    -   [React](https://pankajkumawat.in/tags/react/): Building modern user interfaces.
    -   [Node.js](https://pankajkumawat.in/tags/nodejs/): Backend development with Node.js.
    -   [System Design](https://pankajkumawat.in/tags/system-design/): Architecture patterns and best practices.
    -   [Web Development](https://pankajkumawat.in/tags/web-dev/): Full stack web development techniques.

## Blog
-   Latest Articles
    -   [Building Scalable Web Applications](https://pankajkumawat.in/blog/building-scalable-web-applications/): Best practices for scalable architecture.
    -   [Modern Web Development](https://pankajkumawat.in/blog/modern-web-development/): Latest trends and technologies.
-   Categories
    -   Software Engineering
        -   [System Design Principles](https://pankajkumawat.in/blog/system-design-principles/): A comprehensive guide to system design.
    -   Full Stack Development
        -   [Full Stack Best Practices](https://pankajkumawat.in/blog/fullstack-best-practices/): Building complete applications.

## Optional
-   [Resume/CV](https://pankajkumawat.in/resume/): Downloadable professional resume.
